Text: Seed and spread the good moozik.

Thanks for this!  Exactly what I was looking for.  I listened to two Satie CDs by Pascal RogĂŠ today and missed the startlingly slow but entirely perfect tempi of de Leeuw, a few tracks of which a friend put on a compilation disc for me some years ago.  I always meant to get the full album and, well, here it is!  Again, many thanks!
